channel.title: Chess on TrozWare
channel.description: Recent content in Chess on TrozWare

item.title: A Knight's Move 1.3
item.description: UPDATE: September 2016 - A Knight’s Move for iOS is no longer available. A Knight’s Move for Mac is still supported. A Knight’s Move has been updated to version 1.3. The Mac version is available through the Mac App Store. Three new level packs: Eight by Eight Bishops Rule Castles Eight by Eight has every puzzle set in a chessboard sized grid with more conventional placing of pieces.

item.title: A Knight's Move Released
item.description: UPDATE: September 2016 - A Knight’s Move for iOS is no longer available. A Knight’s Move for Mac is still supported. “A Knight’s Move” is a fun, addictive and simple puzzle game based on the movements of chess pieces. Your goal is to move your white knight across a board to a target square using the same movements as a knight in chess. Pawns may block your way, while enemy bishops, castles, knights and the queen may try to stop you.

item.title: A Knight's Move
item.description: A Knight’s Move is a puzzle game where you have to move your knight across a board to a target square using the same movements as a knight in chess. Pawns may block your way, while enemy bishops, castles, knights and the queen may try to stop you. UPDATE: Version 1.3 for Mac now available. Available from the Mac App Store for OS X 10.7 or later Get from the starting position to the target in the shortest possible number of moves.
